Tunable.name: mbEnabled
Tunable.description: Turn On or Off the whole effect

Tunable.name: mFractionalTod
Tunable.description: The time of day, in 24 hours fractional hours, ie 14.25 means 2:15pm.

Tunable.name: mInputGamma_B
Tunable.description: gamma input range for the blue channel.

Tunable.name: mInputGamma_G
Tunable.description: gamma input range for the green channel.

Tunable.name: mInputGamma_R
Tunable.description: gamma input range for the red channel.

Tunable.name: mInputMax_B
Tunable.description: max input range for the blue channel.

Tunable.name: mInputMax_G
Tunable.description: max input range for the green channel.

Tunable.name: mInputMax_R
Tunable.description: max input range for the red channel.

Tunable.name: mInputMin_B
Tunable.description: min input range for the blue channel.

Tunable.name: mInputMin_G
Tunable.description: min input range for the green channel.

Tunable.name: mInputMin_R
Tunable.description: min input range for the red channel.

Tunable.name: mNumKeysToUse
Tunable.description: number of keys between 1 and 4 to control the z based color saturation

Tunable.name: mOutputMax_B
Tunable.description: min output range for the blue channel.

Tunable.name: mOutputMax_G
Tunable.description: min output range for the green channel.

Tunable.name: mOutputMax_R
Tunable.description: min output range for the red channel.

Tunable.name: mOutputMin_B
Tunable.description: min output range for the blue channel.

Tunable.name: mOutputMin_G
Tunable.description: min output range for the green channel.

Tunable.name: mOutputMin_R
Tunable.description: min output range for the red channel.

Tunable.name: mSaturation_0
Tunable.description: color saturation factor at the specific distance, 0 means full grey level and 1 means fully colored

Tunable.name: mSaturation_1
Tunable.description: color saturation factor at the specific distance, 0 means full grey level and 1 means fully colored

Tunable.name: mSaturation_2
Tunable.description: color saturation factor at the specific distance, 0 means full grey level and 1 means fully colored

Tunable.name: mSaturation_3
Tunable.description: color saturation factor at the specific distance, 0 means full grey level and 1 means fully colored

Tunable.name: mZ_0
Tunable.description: camera z distance to apply the above saturation factor

Tunable.name: mZ_1
Tunable.description: camera z distance to apply the above saturation factor

Tunable.name: mZ_2
Tunable.description: camera z distance to apply the above saturation factor

Tunable.name: mZ_3
Tunable.description: camera z distance to apply the above saturation factor
